name: The Search for Amelia Earhart
summary:
Follow Amelia Earhart's life through space and time to learn about her accomplishments and discover what could have really happened to her on her last flight. Only you can discover the truth of what really happened on that long flight so many years ago!
Find the missing clues in this exciting Hidden Object Adventure game and solve 5 mind-bending mini-games including spot the difference and plot the coordinates. Explore 32 scenes in order to find clues and reveal the missing links to Amelia's disappearance.
